body.query: FROM events | eval ip_str = mv_concat("invalid_", to_string(ip)) | ENRICH networks-policy ON ip_str | sort @timestamp | KEEP ip, name, department, message

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.4-1e553deb1f6f3896c7a4dd11a2a62ee33ab8c9f7 "Line 1:68: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'invalid_' is not an IP string literal."
